title: [聖誕歌改編國際文宣] They spread you the Chinese virus

replies.msg:
之前有睇過post話見到中共利用Propaganda想打造自己成為抗疫既救世者
大家有些少擔心國際上既輿論會被誤導 希望有文宣以正視聽
咁我有一日睇完av之後就突然有左呢個idea 諗住用一首家傳戶曉又簡單既英文歌
改編做一首老少咸宜既文宣 大人細路都識唱
如果覺得ok既 希望大家可以一齊努力 睇下可唔可以錄得成一隻歌(可能放上tweeter?) 唱均全世界
順便拋磚引玉 睇下其他手足有冇更好既創作

Original song: shorturl.at/qASUV
They spread you the Chinese virus
They teach you the Chinese Kung Flu
They spread you the Wuhan virus
After Chinese new year

No party we have, no beer with my friends
They ruin my every weekend I can't see her again

Don't you see the secret funding
They pay cash for better schooling
But they failed the in-house testing
Will they feel ashamed?

No party we have, no beer with my friends
I stay home during weekend and I miss her again

They don't save you from the virus
Who should be the source of virus?
Collusion with WHO
In case you don't know

No party we have, no beer with my friends
Please join we my good friend shall we form a band?

I never trust the Chinese
You never trust the Chinese
We never trust the Chinese
The world is in peace

Working from my home, I write this old song
Together we fight for freedom and stand with Hong Kong

They spread you the Chinese virus
They teach you the Chinese Kung Flu
They spread you the Wuhan virus
After Chinese new year

經典改編 真相還原
本地成就 國際文宣

[更新版]到底大家撐唔撐港台
https://lih.kg/1949128
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
其實呢個post應該喺創意台開呀嘛
